title: Miscellany III

texts.title: Chapter I. Further Remarks on the Author of the Treatises――His Order and Design――His Remarks on the Succession of Wit, and Progress of Letters, and Philosophy――Of Words, Relations, Affections――Country-Men and Country――Old-England――Patriots of the Soil――Virtuosi, and Philosophers――A Taste
